Ifè (ma ọ bụ Ifè) bụ asụsụ Niger–Congo nke ihe dị ka mmadụ 180,000 na-asụ na Togo, Benin na Ghana
A na-akpọkwa ya Ana, Ana-Ifé, Anago, Baate na Ede Ife
Ọ nwere myirịta lexical nke 87%-91% na Ede Nago.
A malitere ịrụ ọrụ ndị e dere ede n’asụsụ ahụ n’afọ ndị 1980, bụ́ ndị Comité Provisoire de Langue Ifɛ̀ na SIL bipụtara
An Ifè–French dictionary (Oŋù-afɔ ŋa nfɛ̀ òŋu òkpi-ŋà ŋa nfãrãsé), a súsú Mary Gardner and Elizabeth Graveling, a 2000 ka.
